summary: Constitution of India is a comprehensive course designed to build strong foundational knowledge in this important area. This subject covers 5 key modules that progressively develop your understanding. You'll gain both theoretical insights and practical skills through lectures and assignments. The course prepares you for advanced studies and professional applications. Mastering this subject will significantly contribute to your academic and career success.
recommended_books: An Introduction to the Constitution of India – M.V. Pylee
Introduction to the Constitution of India – Durga Das Basu
Indian Government and Politics – D.C. Gupta
Constitutional Development and National Movement in India – V.D. Mahajan
The Constitutional Law of India – J. N. Pandey
Indian Constitutional Law – M. P. Jain
course_outcomes: Identify foundational provisions of the Indian Constitution like Preamble, Fundamental Rights and DPSP.
Recognize powers of Legislature, Executive and Judiciary and analyze their distinct roles.
Appraise constitutional provisions, professional ethics and principles of sustainable development.
Analyze interpretation tools and case laws related to the Indian Constitution.
prerequisites: General understanding of the Indian Constitution, basic rights and duties
